information.overview: Spell Caster is a range/mage class equipped with a staff. This class can manipulate the elements on the battle field and has a gauge called “Mana“, which is required to cast some spells. Mana doesn’t recover over time and needs to be charged up by using certain skills. More effective in party battles.

skill_tree.name: Fire Blast
skill_tree.upgrade: This skill can be upgraded 2 times on the skill board. After the last upgrade, 2 skill modifiers will be unlocked.
skill_tree.description: Consumes mana. Shoots a fireball, which can be charged up to 3 levels. Charged level increases the damage of the fireball.

skill_tree.name: Blizzard
skill_tree.upgrade: This skill can be upgraded 2 times on the skill board. After the last upgrade, 2 skill modifiers will be unlocked.
skill_tree.description: Places a chargeable snowstorm, which slows and damages enemies in it. Charge time increases the size of the storm and damage.

skill_tree.name: Flame Grenade
skill_tree.upgrade: This skill can be upgraded 2 times on the skill board. After the last upgrade, 2 skill modifiers will be unlocked.
skill_tree.description: Sends a ball of fire which explodes when touching the enemy. Can be charged up to 3 times.

skill_tree.name: Lighting
skill_tree.upgrade: This skill can be upgraded 2 times on the skill board. After the last upgrade, 2 skill modifiers will be unlocked.
skill_tree.description: Shoots lightning bolts, which can be charged up to 3 levels. Charged level increases the amount of lightning bolts. At max charge you will get charge time reduction buff for all your skills.

skill_tree.name: Thunder Mine
skill_tree.upgrade: This skill can be upgraded 2 times on the skill board. After the last upgrade, 2 skill modifiers will be unlocked.
skill_tree.description: Summons a lightning mine following the enemy to the hit and causes an explosion. At each charge level, a mine is added.

skill_tree.name: Frigid Clash
skill_tree.upgrade: This skill can be upgraded 2 times on the skill board. After the last upgrade, 2 skill modifiers will be unlocked.
skill_tree.description: Summons an iceberg over the enemy. Competence can be charged, with each load an iceberg is added.

skill_tree.name: Follow Bullet
skill_tree.upgrade: This skill can be upgraded 2 times on the skill board. After the last upgrade, 2 skill modifiers will be unlocked.
skill_tree.description: Summons two crystal. For each skill used, the crystals will inflict damage on the enemy depending on the element of the skill.

skill_tree.name: Meteor Inferno
skill_tree.description: Summons a huge meteor, which deals enormous damage.

skill_tree.name: ~~Heal Skill~~
skill_tree.upgrade: ~~This skill can be upgraded 2 times on the skill board.~~
skill_tree.description: This skill was changed during the closed beta and will be updated as soon as possible.

skill_tree.name: Trinity Shot | Left Click
skill_tree.upgrade: This skill can be upgraded 2 times on the skill board.

skill_tree.name: Sub Action | Right Click
skill_tree.upgrade: This skill can be upgraded 2 times on the skill board.
skill_tree.description: Shoots trinity bolts, which recover mana.
